actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove the maximum limitation on the deduction for nonbusiness casualty losses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the percentage limitation on the income tax deduction for nonbusiness casualty losses enacted by the Tax Equity and Fiscal Responsibility Act of 1982.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove the maximum limitation on the deduction for nonbusiness casualty losses.
